channel.title: Mining base
channel.description:
Its been a while since i've been on the forums, and ive noticed that the tutorial section was cleaned... (again)
And i need a basic mining base for my server, does anyone want to help me out with this? I could do it myself but it would take a little while and honestly i don't feel up to it..
